paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: The interval time for auto report the battery level"

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Level
paramInformation.description: Setting the basic command value to turn on the light. the 0xff(-1) means turn on the light. for dimmer equipment 1 to 100 means  the light strength. 0 means turn off the light

metadata.inclusion:
1. Have Z-Wave™ Controller entered add mode.
2. Press the key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the add mode.
3. After add successful, the device will wake to receive the setting command from Z-Wave ™ Controller about 20 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
1. Have Z-Wave ™ Controller entered remove mode.
2. Press the key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the 
remove mode.
Node ID has been excluded
metadata.reset:
Notice: Use this procedure only in the event that the primary controller is lost or otherwise inoperable.
1. Press the key three times,and do not release the key in the 4 th pressed, and the LED will light ON.
2. After 3 seconds the LED will turn OFF, after that within 2 seconds, release the keys. If successful, the LED will light ON one second. Otherwise, the LED will flash once.
3. IDs are remove and all settings will reset to factory 
default
